name: Lunchtime Mark
shortDesc: A mark for a peckish Pokémon.
title: the Peckish
conditions: On a caught Pokémon found in the middle of the day

name: Sleepy-Time Mark
shortDesc: A mark for a sleepy Pokémon.
title: the Sleepy
conditions: On a caught Pokémon found at night

name: Dusk Mark
shortDesc: A mark for a dozy Pokémon.
title: the Dozy
conditions: On a caught Pokémon found in the evening

name: Dawn Mark
shortDesc: A mark for an early-riser Pokémon.
title: the Early Riser
conditions: On a caught Pokémon found in the morning

name: Cloudy Mark
shortDesc: A mark for a cloud-watching Pokémon.

conditions: On a caught Pokémon found while it's overcast

name: Destiny Mark
shortDesc: A mark of a chosen Pokémon.
title: the Chosen One
conditions: Available randomly on wild Pokémon on the day set as your birthday

name: Fishing Mark
shortDesc: A mark of a catch-of-the-day Pokémon.
title: the Catch of the Day
conditions: On a caught Pokémon found by fishing

name: Curry Mark
shortDesc: A mark of a curry-connoisseur Pokémon.
title: the Curry Connoisseur
conditions: On a Pokémon that comes to your camp after you cook Curry

name: Jumbo Mark
shortDesc: A mark for a Pokémon that's the largest it can be.
title: the Great
conditions: In Mesagoza, speak to a person with Pachirisu near flower beds in west. Given to Pokémon with maximum size values

name: Mini Mark
shortDesc: A mark for a Pokémon that's the smallest it can be.
title: the Teeny
conditions: In Mesagoza, speak to a person with Pachirisu near flower beds in west. Given to Pokémon with minimum size values

name: Partner Mark
shortDesc: A mark for a friendly Pokémon.
title: the Reliable Partner
conditions: Have your Pokémon's friendship be at 200 or higher - Randomly added after walking around with it

name: Itemfinder Mark
shortDesc: A mark for a Pokémon that likes to pick things up.
title: the Treasure Hunter
conditions: Randomly given after Pokémon find items in Let's Go mode

name: Gourmand Mark
shortDesc: A mark for a Pokémon gourmet.
title: the Gourmet
conditions:
Make sandwiches with the Pokémon
Purchase a food item in a shop

name: Mightiest Mark
shortDesc: A mark for an especially mighty Pokémon.
title: the Unrivaled
conditions: Automatically attached to any Pokémon caught in a 7 Star Raid

name: Titan Mark
shortDesc: A mark for a Pokémon that was an titan.
title: the Former Titan
conditions: A mark given to a Pokémon that was a Titan

name: Alpha Mark
shortDesc: A mark for a Pokémon that was an alpha.
title: the Former Alpha
conditions: A mark given to a Pokémon that was an Alpha in Pokémon Legends Arceus
